page.title: 05Mr. Parr The Postman.
page.content: {Mr. Parr}has lived in{Fordham}all his life and as a child he wanted to be a{policeman.}He went to the old school in{Station Road}and thinks the new school has changed with the times. {Mr. Parr}started his job as a{postman {16 years ago.}He works very hard and begins his round{5.30 a.m.}it takes him{8 hours}to cover a distance of{20 {miles}a day.{Mr. Parr}thinks it's not very nice delivering letters during the Winter but he enjoys it during the Summer. The most{unusual parcel}that he has{delivered}was a{dustbin}it was so big that he put his letters in it. He uses his{bike as transport}on his post round.{Mr. Parr}takes the letters out of one box in the village which is down{Isleham Road.}Like most postmen {Mr. Parr}hates dogs. He has been bitten{11 times in 16 years}but they were not very serious bites.{Mr. Parr
